New European Censor Project Incore

18 Oct 1999

The European Union department DG XIII is creating\na new rating and censor project called INCORE, as they\nsay it is planned to help to protect younger participants\nof the Internet from dangerous sites.

They want the online comunity to correspond with them,\nsee the online poll at \nhttp://www.incore.org/paper/paper.htm

The Web site includes an explanation of the background \nto the INCORE project and links to the supporter\nEuropean Action Plan on Safer Use of the \nInternet.
